info.title: Prism Finance API
info.description: API documentation for Prism Finance, including authentication endpoints.

post.description: Sign in with a social provider

callbackURL.description: Callback URL to redirect to after the user has signed in

errorCallbackURL.description: Callback URL to redirect to if an error happens

disableRedirect.description: Disable automatic redirection to the provider. Useful for handling the redirection yourself

idToken.description: ID token from the provider to sign in the user with id token

400.description: Bad Request. Usually due to missing parameters, or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Due to missing or invalid authentication.

403.description: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource or to perform this action.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource was not found.

429.description: Too Many Requests. You have exceeded the rate limit. Try again later.

500.description: Internal Server Error. This is a problem with the server that you cannot fix.

post.description: Send a password reset email to the user

email.description: The email address of the user to send a password reset email to

redirectTo.description: The URL to redirect the user to reset their password. If the token isn't valid or expired, it'll be redirected with a query parameter `?error=INVALID_TOKEN`. If the token is valid, it'll be redirected with a query parameter `?token=VALID_TOKEN

get.description: Search for financial institutions by name, with optional filters for products, country, and type.

schema.description: Search query string to match against institution names

parameters.description: Search query string to match against institution names
parameters.name: q

schema.description: Filter by comma-separated list of products (auth, transactions, balance, investments)

parameters.description: Filter by comma-separated list of products (auth, transactions, balance, investments)
parameters.name: products

schema.description: Filter by country code where institution operates (US, CA, GB, EU)

parameters.description: Filter by country code where institution operates (US, CA, GB, EU)
parameters.name: country

schema.description: Filter by institution type (bank, credit, investment, loan)

parameters.description: Filter by institution type (bank, credit, investment, loan)
parameters.name: type

schema.description: Number of results per page (default: 10, max: 100)

parameters.description: Number of results per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)
parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Field to sort results by (name, type, status)

parameters.description: Field to sort results by (name, type, status)
parameters.name: sort

schema.description: Sort order for results (asc, desc)

parameters.description: Sort order for results (asc, desc)
parameters.name: order

200.description: Successfully retrieved search results with pagination information

name.description: Official name of the financial institution

logo.description: URL to the institution's logo image

website.description: Official website URL of the institution

primaryColor.description: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., #000000)

type.description: Type of institution (bank, credit, investment, loan)

status.description: Current status of the institution (active, inactive, maintenance)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the institution was first added to the system

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to institution data

products.description: List of financial products supported (auth, transactions, balance, investments)

supportedCountries.description: List of country codes where the institution operates (US, CA, GB, EU)

provider.description: ID of the data provider serving this institution

results.description: List of institutions matching the search criteria

pagination.description: Pagination information for the search results

400.description: Bad Request - The request was malformed or contains invalid parameters

code.description: Machine-readable error code identifying the type of error

error.description: Error details including code and message

error.message: Invalid parameter: 'status' must be one of [active, inactive, error]

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific financial institution, including supported products and operating countries.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the institution to retrieve
parameters.name: id

name.description: Official name of the financial institution

logo.description: URL to the institution's logo image

primaryColor.description: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., #000000)

type.description: Type of institution (bank, credit, investment, loan)

status.description: Current status of the institution (active, inactive, maintenance)

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the institution was first added to the system

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to institution data

products.description: List of financial products supported (auth, transactions, balance, investments)

supportedCountries.description: List of country codes where the institution operates (US, CA, GB, EU)

displayName.description: Display name of the data provider

status.description: Current status of the provider

institution.description: Detailed information about the requested institution

provider.description: ID of the data provider serving this institution

post.description: Establish a new connection with a financial institution using provided credentials. This will initiate the account discovery process.

institutionId.description: ID of the financial institution to connect to

providerId.description: ID of the data provider to use for this connection

200.description: Successfully created connection and discovered accounts

userId.description: ID of the user who owns this connection

institutionId.description: ID of the connected financial institution

providerId.description: ID of the data provider handling this connection

status.description: Current status of the connection (connected, disconnected, error)

error.description: Error message if the connection is in error state

lastSync.description: Timestamp of the last successful data synchronization

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the connection was established

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to connection data

id.description: Unique identifier for the financial account

name.description: Display name of the account as provided by the institution

type.description: Primary account type (checking, savings, credit, investment, loan, etc.)

subtype.description: Specific account subtype for more detailed classification (e.g., 401k, roth, rewards credit card)

status.description: Current account status (active, inactive, error, closed)

balance.description: Current balance of the account, as of the last sync

currency.description: ISO currency code for the account (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

lastSync.description: Timestamp of the last successful data synchronization

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the account was first discovered

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to account information

accounts.description: List of financial accounts associated with this connection

connection.description: Detailed connection information including linked accounts

post.description: Refresh a connection to sync latest account information, detect new accounts, and identify removed accounts. This operation will update account balances and status.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the connection to refresh
parameters.name: id

200.description: Successfully refreshed connection and synced account changes

userId.description: ID of the user who owns this connection

providerId.description: ID of the data provider handling this connection

name.description: Display name of the account as provided by the institution

subtype.description: Specific account subtype for more detailed classification (e.g., 401k, roth, rewards credit card)

status.description: Current account status (active, inactive, error, closed)

balance.description: Current balance of the account, as of the last sync

currency.description: ISO currency code for the account (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)

error.description: Error details including code and message

error.message: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later

get.description: Get the profile information of the currently authenticated user

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired token
